方法详细信息

load

public void load(java.lang.String directory,
                 java.lang.String fileName)
This method creates a file input stream and uses the method "process" to append new character

指定者：
接口 Decodable 中的 load
参数：
directory - the absolute path of files
fileName - currently scanned file`s name

process

protected int process(char temp,
                      java.lang.String fileName)
This method will gather the character`s and append it into the table when meet a interpunction

参数：
temp - current char which is read from a FileInputStream
pos - the positon of the current string
fileName - currently scanned file`s name
返回：
refresh the change to the postion of current string
